thread.title: Calvin Harris – “Slide” (Feat. Frank Ocean & Migos) - Stereogum
thread.title_full: Calvin Harris – “Slide” (Feat. Frank Ocean & Migos) - Stereogum

author: Peter Helman
title: Calvin Harris – “Slide” (Feat. Frank Ocean & Migos) - Stereogum
text:
Peter Helman @_peterhelman | February 23, 2017 - 11:10 pm Share < br />this article: 
Calvin Harris has been teasing his collab with Frank Ocean and Migos for about a month now, and it’s finally out in the world. Per the credits, Harris, Ocean, Offset, and Quavo are all listed as writers. (Sorry, Takeoff.) Confirming that he ditched his label , Ocean is listed as “appearing courtesy of Frank Ocean.” Hear the song below. CALVIN HARRIS // FRANK OCEAN // MIGOS pic.twitter.com/UvsJzm9F6k 
— Calvin Harris (@CalvinHarris) February 21, 2017 
In other Frank Ocean news, as Pitchfork reports, Frank Ocean is working on some new “space reggae” music. “Then he played me this song the other day,” John Mayer revealed during a recent Instagram live stream. “I won’t say the title, that’s his business, but… He’s doing stuff right now that’s… talk about space reggae, future reggae, that’s Frank Ocean.” You heard it from John Mayer first, folks!
